notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: TH, JA and AN conceived of the study. TH and JA equally contributed to this manuscript. TH, JA, KA, NM, TY, TM, AF and HO will perform the baseline colonoscopy and polypectomy. JA, TH and KA will conduct another count of ACF using a DVD recording to ensure its validity. TT, NM, TY, AF and HO will recruit participants and follow-up at the outpatient clinic. Analysis and interpretation of data will be conducted by TH, JA and KA. All the authors have read the final manuscript and approve of its submission for publication.
